Notes.Text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-21679: Fixed a buffer overflow in WritePCXImage function in pcx.c which may allow a remote attackers to cause a denial of service. (bsc#1214578)

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in WritePCXImage function in pcx.c in GraphicsMagick 1.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via converting of crafted image file to pcx format.
